incident_description: Policyholder Donald Duck reports a severe car accident involving his vehicle and another. Donald asserts that the incident occurred while he was driving at a perfectly safe speed, when the other driver recklessly zoomed into his lane, resulting in a massive collision.

communication_logs.transcript: Policyholder: 'Hello! This is Donald Duck! I've just been in a terrible car accident! The other driver was a menace on the road, just barreled into my lane without a care in the world! I've never seen such reckless driving!'

Policyholder: 'I demand immediate action on this claim! The other driver was a complete hazard and should be held fully responsible for the massive damage to my vehicle. I've attached pictures - the impact was so powerful, my car practically flew into the air! Regards, an extremely angry Donald Duck.'

additional_information.content:
Patient: Donald Duck
Date of Visit: 2023-06-26
Reason for Visit: Car Accident

Patient presented with complaints of neck pain, back pain, and dizziness following a car accident. Patient states he was hit by another car that abruptly switched lanes.

Examination revealed mild tenderness in the neck and back regions, but no visible injuries. X-rays of the cervical and lumbar spine were taken and showed no fractures.

Diagnosis: Soft tissue injury

Plan: The patient was advised to rest, avoid strenuous activities, and use over-the-counter pain medication. A follow-up appointment was scheduled for next week.

Incident Type: Car Accident
Date/Time: 2023-06-25, 4:30 PM
Location: Florida Road, Durban, KwaZulu-Natal, South Africa

Upon arrival, I observed two vehicles with side collision damage. Vehicle 1 (yellow sedan, driven by Donald Duck) had damage on the driver's side, and Vehicle 2 (red pickup truck, driven by Mickey Mouse) had front-end damage.

Donald Duck stated that he was driving when Mickey Mouse suddenly zoomed into his lane and hit him. Mickey Mouse stated that he was driving normally when Donald Duck's car suddenly swerved in front of him.

Both drivers exchanged insurance information. No serious injuries were reported at the scene. Both vehicles were drivable and left the scene under their own power.

No citations were issued at the scene. Both drivers were advised to contact their insurance companies.
